comments:
I have a subclass of EStoreEObjectImpl with an EString attribute. When I attempt to set a value to this attribute I receive the following exception:

java.lang.ClassCastException: java.lang.String cannot be cast to org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList

Patch suggested by Ed Merks

Copied from the newsgroup thread http://www.eclipse.org/newsportal/article.php?id=21583&group=eclipse.tools.emf#21583

Eike,

Sorry, I should have mentioned that I opened one and committed the fix already.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 169180 ***
